programme.title: The Man with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor for his portrayal of Frankie Machine, a former drug addict struggling with sobriety after he’s released from prison. Though Frankie dreams of a music career, he finds himself caught up in a web of lies, betrayal, and murder that could eventually lead to his downfall. Based on the novel by Nelson Algren, The Man With the Golden Arm was added to the National Film Registry by the Library of Congress in 2020.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: Director John Landis joins Trailers from Hell to talk 'Battle for the Planet of the Apes' and more.

programme.desc: From 'Bonnie and Clyde' to 'Duck Soup,' filmmaker John Landis talks his favorite film trailers.

programme.title: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: John Landis returns to Trailers from Hell to talk 'Citizen Kane' and more classic movies.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1940s Vol. 1
programme.desc: Your favorite filmmakers explore the eerie classics that defined a decade of supernatural thrills and monster madness.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1940s Vol. 2
programme.desc: These 1940s horror films define the decade's fascination with the supernatural and monstrous.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 1
programme.desc: Enter the realm of 1970s horror, featuring vampiric tales, psychological terror, and innovative creature features.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 2
programme.desc: Explore the grittier side of 1970s horror with a collection of gruesome tales that push the boundaries of blood and mayhem.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 3
programme.desc: Experience the unsettling horror of the 1970s, featuring a mix of psychological tension, supernatural dread, and iconic cult films.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 4
programme.desc: From supernatural chillers to psychological thrillers, few decades can match the 70s when it comes to horror.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1970s Vol. 5
programme.desc: These 70s horror hits blend iconic slashers, cult classics, and supernatural threats with an atmosphere of terror and paranoia.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1980s Vol. 1
programme.desc: The 1980s delivered a brutal mix of slashers, supernatural terrors, and campy thrills that left a lasting mark on the genre.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1980s Vol. 2
programme.desc: Showcasing the genre's evolving creativity and daring vision, the 1980s delivered a diverse mix of gritty slashers and supernatural chills.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1980s Vol. 3
programme.desc: Exploring the darker side of the 1980s, this collection delves into chilling tales of possession, alien encounters, and psychological horror that pushed the boundaries of the genre.

programme.title: Decades of Horror: 1990s
programme.desc: From innovative horror to psychological thrills with supernatural elements, these 1990s films redefined the genre.

programme.desc: From slapstick classics to timeless musical comedies, celebrate Hollywood's golden age of laughter.
